tasks.task_description: Analyze CloudFormation template for all external dependencies
Check for any additional scripts or configuration files
Compile comprehensive list of all external dependencies

description: Analyze deploy-uswest2a-only.sh and related CloudFormation templates to identify ALL external dependencies (S3, URLs, packages, services, etc.)
context: Examined deploy-uswest2a-only.sh script. Found it uses uswest2a-only-template.yaml as CloudFormation template and makes AWS CLI calls for spot pricing and deployment.
Analyzed CloudFormation template. Found key external dependencies: S3 bucket for setup script download, AWS CLI download URL, EC2 instance metadata service, and various AWS services.
Found additional scripts in the directory. Now compiling comprehensive list of all external dependencies.
Compiled comprehensive list of all external dependencies from deploy-uswest2a-only.sh script and CloudFormation template analysis.
